attributes.action: Remove the £50k earnings cap for eligibility for the self-employed grant
attributes.additional_details: Just because you earned over £50k in the 2017/18 tax year does not mean that is still the case in 2020 and also we have bills just like everyone else. This is discrimination
attributes.background: Remove the £50k earnings cap for eligibility for the self-employed grant

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551833

This petition was briefly opened incorrectly.
